Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1979...
Had first career hit on 9/12/1979, off Pedro Segarra (Min)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/6/1980, off Marcos Chaidez (Mal)...
Drove in 6 runs against Plum Grove on 6/30/1983...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1985, hitting .609 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/2/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $1,820,000 per year...
